title: The Last of Us Episode 9 BREAKDOWN (FULL SPOILERS)
description:
Go to http://joinhoney.com/kindafunny to get PayPal Honey for free.

Tim Gettys, Greg Miller, and Blessing Adeoye Jr. break down the season finale of HBO's The Last of Us starring Pedro Pascal and Bella Ramsey.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:06 - A Wild Guest Appears!
00:06:01 - Housekeeping
00:08:53 - Our Overall Thoughts on the Finale
00:28:14 - Looking back at the whole show

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
